Container.changes: [center][img width='460px' src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ninthwalker/docker-templates/master/brentsflix/images/slack-square.png'][/center] [center][font size=4]slack-welcome Changelog[/font][/center] [b]03MAR2017:[/b] Initial unRAID Template release[br]
Container.Name: slack-hubot
Container.Description: This is a Docker for the slack-hubot[br] It automatically sends a message to users when they join your team[br] Forked from original creators page at: https://github.com/ninthwalker/slack-welcome[br][br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Change the variables to your own:[/span][/b][br] [b]WELCOME_MESSAGE[/b] : Custom welcome message[br][br] [b]SLACK_TOKEN[/b] : Create one with a custom bot integration here:[br] https://my.slack.com/services/new/bot[br][br] Full info on github site: https://github.com/ninthwalker/slack-welcome[br]
Container.Overview: Send a welcome messageto a slack user when they join your team
